description:
As the story of Kuma and Zoro is discussed, Brooks remembers back to when he was alive.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Promise from a Distant Day! The Pirates` Song and a Small Whale!
Tooi Hi no Yakusoku: Kaizoku no Uta to Chiisana Kujira
Une promesse très lointaine. La chanson des pirates et la petite baleine
Обещание из далёкого прошлого – китёнок и пиратская песня
遠い日の約束 海賊の唄と小さなクジラ
